Title: Acne
Description: Uninflamed blackheads to pus-filled pimples or large, red and tender bumps.

Title: Black heads
Description: Open bumps on the skin that fill with excess oil and dead skin

Title: Dark circles
Description: Dark circles under your eyes happen when the skin beneath both eyes appears darkened

Title: Dryness
Description: Skin easily loses moisture and hydration causing rough, flaky or scaly patches of skin.

Title: Dullness
Description: A lack of radiance or an inability to reflect light well. Skin looks dry, patchy, ashy, or lackluster.

Title: Oiliness
Description: Oversized sebaceous glands produce excessive amounts of sebum giving the appearance of shiny and greasy skin.

Title: Redness
Description: A response of skin tissues to injury or irritation; characterized by pain and swelling and redness and heat.

Title: Uneven texture
Description: Skin feel rough or bumpy to the touch due to excess dead skin cells built up on the surface of the skin
